column2: BRIEF-Bancorpsouth Bank To Acquire Icon Capital Corporation In Houston, Texas April 18 (Reuters) - Bancorpsouth Bank: * UNDER TERMS OF MERGER AGREEMENT, BANCORPSOUTH BANK WILL ISSUE 4.1 MILLION SHARES OF BANCORPSOUTH BANK COMMON STOCK * CO WILL ALSO ISSUE $17.5 MILLION IN CASH, FOR ALL OUTSTANDING SHARES OF ICON CAPITAL CORPORATION CAPITAL STOCK * MERGER HAS BEEN UNANIMOUSLY APPROVED BY BOARDS OF DIRECTORS OF BOTH COMPANIES * BANCORPSOUTH- UPON COMPLETION OF TRANSACTION, MARK REILEY WILL SERVE AS BANCORPSOUTH BANKâ€™S HOUSTON AREA CHAIRMAN * BANCORPSOUTH- UPON COMPLETION OF TRANSACTION, JOHN GREEN WILL BE THE HOUSTON DIVISION PRESIDENT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-BancorpSouth Reports Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.54 April 18 (Reuters) - BancorpSouth Bank: * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.51 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * NET INTEREST REVENUE WAS $138.1 MILLION FOR Q1 OF 2018, AN INCREASE OF 20.5 PERCENT FROM $114.6 MILLION FOR Q1 OF 2017 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
